*****NOTE*****
if you are having trouble extracting iso through image browser, etc. try right clicking the game file (large one) go to properties and uncheck read-only and click apply. now it should work pop up in image brower. disc 2 is the HD textures pack for better enhanced graphics. as to using a jtag/rgh i do not know how to get this to work. I've extracted the content through image browser and added it to my HDD:1/content/000000000000000/Game Title/00000002 and added the TU but still no luck if anyone knows a solution to this please help me out the graphics are unbearable w/o the texture pack

@ r4t i was saying about i love my jtag because you here alot of people complaining they cant get the burnt game to work. and the reason why i extract the game is because of the size of most games are 8gb per image but when extracted it might only be 2gb so i save on space which was a big issue for me when i only had an internal 1tb hdd but now i have an external 2tb connected too but its filling up very fast and it would already be full if i didnt extract the games to make them smaller
@GetBangedOnNewb i think you should put the texture pack into the content/0000000000000000/ not into the extra content folder 00000002. i might be wrong but try it out

For RGH I can confirm that is hdd1/content/0000000000000000/43430814/00000002 is the correct path. If it does not exist, just create it and copy the 2 files on content folder of disc 2

The path hdd1/content/0000000000000000/FFED2000/FFFFFFFF/ does not work. Don't copy the 2 files there.
